data.title: S V Ranga Rao Hits and Flops Movies List
data.meta_description: S V Ranga Rao Hits and Flops Movies List: Samarla Venkata Ranga Rao (SVR) was an Indian actor, director, and producer best known for his work in Telugu and
data.text:
S V Ranga Rao Hits and Flops Movies List: Samarla Venkata Ranga Rao (SVR) was an Indian actor, director, and producer best known for his work in Telugu and Tamil film industries. He died on July 18, 1974, at the age of 76. Rao was called “Viswa Nata Chakravarthi” by his admirers and followers.

His cinematic career spanned 30 years and included numerous awards, including the Filmfare Special Award-South and numerous other honors from throughout the world. At the first India International Film Festival, held in Mumbai on January 24, 1952, Rao featured in the fantasy film, Pathala Bhairavi. Rao’s performance as the tantric, Nepala Manthrikudu, in the mega-hit film, was well praised.
